about.title: About Us
about.content: Tezrent connects contractors with reliable machinery suppliers to keep projects moving.

sectionHeader.title: Your Trusted Equipment Partner
sectionHeader.subtitle: We're revolutionizing equipment rental with our extensive inventory, reliable service, and seamless experience.

mission.paragraph1: At Tezrent, our mission is to make quality equipment accessible to everyone, from DIY homeowners to large construction companies. We believe the right tools should never be a barrier to getting the job done right.
mission.paragraph2: We've built a platform that simplifies equipment rental with transparent pricing, reliable maintenance, and exceptional customer support—ensuring you can focus on your project, not your tools.

story.paragraph1: Founded in 2018 by a team of contractors and tech innovators, Tezrent was born from frustration with traditional equipment rental processes. We saw an opportunity to leverage technology to create a more efficient, user-friendly rental experience.
story.paragraph2: Starting with just 50 items in a small warehouse, we've grown to over 1,200 pieces of equipment across multiple categories, serving thousands of satisfied customers nationwide.

approach.paragraph1: Our approach centers on three core principles: quality, reliability, and convenience. Every piece of equipment undergoes rigorous maintenance and testing before each rental.
approach.paragraph2: We've developed streamlined logistics to ensure on-time delivery and pickup, and our customer support team is always ready to provide expert advice on choosing and using the right equipment for your specific needs.

description.heading: How It Works
description.intro: Renting machinery with Tezrent is simple, transparent, and efficient. Our app is designed to make your equipment rental experience smooth from start to finish.

step1.title: Browse & Search
step1.description: Explore a wide range of machinery and filter by type, size, or availability to find exactly what you need.

step2.title: Easy Booking
step2.description: Select your equipment, choose rental dates, and book instantly through our secure platform.

step3.title: Seamless Delivery or Pickup
step3.description: Arrange for delivery to your site or pick up the machinery at your convenience.

step4.title: Manage & Return
step4.description: Track your rentals, extend periods if needed, and return equipment easily—all within the app.

termsAndConditions.heading: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.intro: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using the Tezrent machinery rental service. By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these terms.
termsAndConditions.agreement: By using Tezrent services, you acknowledge that you have read and understood these Terms and Conditions and agree to be bound by them.

sections.title: Equipment Rental Terms
sections.content:
1.1. Rental Period: Minimum rental period is 24 hours. Rental periods begin at the time of equipment pickup or delivery.

1.2. Reservation: Equipment reservations must be made at least 24 hours in advance.

1.3. Cancellation: Cancellations must be made at least 24 hours before the scheduled rental to avoid a cancellation fee of 25% of the rental amount.

1.4. Extensions: Rental extensions must be requested before the end of the current rental period and are subject to availability.

sections.title: Payment Terms
sections.content:
2.1. Rates: All rental rates are calculated on a 24-hour basis unless otherwise specified.

2.2. Security Deposit: A security deposit may be required before equipment rental. The deposit amount varies based on the equipment value.

2.3. Payment Methods: We accept credit cards, debit cards, and approved purchase orders.

2.4. Late Fees: Equipment returned after the agreed return time will incur additional charges at the standard daily rate.

sections.title: Equipment Usage & Safety
sections.content:
3.1. Authorized Operators: Only qualified individuals who meet minimum age and experience requirements may operate the equipment.

3.2. Proper Use: Equipment must be used in accordance with manufacturer guidelines and only for its intended purpose.

3.3. Safety Requirements: Users must follow all safety protocols and wear appropriate protective equipment.

3.4. Prohibited Activities: Equipment may not be used for illegal activities or in unsafe conditions including severe weather events.

sections.title: Damage & Liability
sections.content:
4.1. Equipment Inspection: Customers must inspect equipment upon receipt and report any existing damage.

4.2. Responsibility: The customer is responsible for all damage to equipment during the rental period, excluding normal wear and tear.

4.3. Insurance: Proof of appropriate insurance may be required prior to rental.

4.4. Limitation of Liability: Tezrent is not liable for any indirect, special, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use of rental equipment.

sections.title: Delivery & Return
sections.content:
5.1. Delivery: Delivery services are available within the specified service area for an additional fee.

5.2. Return Condition: Equipment must be returned in clean, undamaged condition with fuel levels matching those at pickup.

5.3. Late Returns: Equipment returned after the agreed-upon time will incur additional daily charges.

5.4. Cleaning Fee: A cleaning fee will be applied if equipment is returned excessively dirty.
